meanings.definition: The time of day when lunch is typically eaten.
meanings.sent1: At lunchtime, we all gather around the table to eat together.
meanings.sent2: I usually have a sandwich at lunchtime.
meanings.sent3: During lunchtime, my dog always begs for a bite of my food.
meanings.sent4: The sun was high in the sky, signaling the arrival of lunchtime.
meanings.sent5: The school bell rang, announcing the start of lunchtime.

meanings.definition: The period of time designated for eating lunch.
meanings.sent1: Our lunchtime is from 12:00 to 1:00 p.m.
meanings.sent2: During lunchtime, the cafeteria is always crowded with students.
meanings.sent3: I always look forward to lunchtime because I get to chat with my friends.
meanings.sent4: The lunchtime rush at the restaurant can be quite hectic.
meanings.sent5: The office becomes lively during lunchtime as colleagues share stories.
